products.title: Wow Factor, Silver Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The brushed silver wow factor in silver crackle is a striking, lightly textured venetian blind, crafted from heavy gauge aluminium, and with a soft, crackled effect on the surface. products.title: Wood Effect, Provincial - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and natural, the wood effect's provincial is a must-have for cool sophistication. Made from a wood-effect, heavy gauge aluminium, and formed into slim slats that can be easily adjusted, this blind is both a practical and a stylish choice. Design a light, airy, and natural-feel living room by teaming the provincial with soft creams, dark browns, and matching woods. Simple dcor is all that's required to support the provincial, as its lovely natural feel needs no excess, wherever it's placed.

products.title: Wow Factor, Dark Star - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in dark star unites charcoal grey with a pretty, shimmering silver, on heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easily adjustable to change the light content of the room. These unique features make this blind an obvious choice when choosing a stylish venetian blind. Using the dark star in a teenager's bedroom will provide grown-up style, with the glistening dark silver showing attitude and fun.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Castle Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: A classic grey shade, the castle grey satin from the ecowood deluxe range is a cool and contemporary venetian blind, carefully crafted from durable faux wood that mimics the real thing perfectly. The look is finished off with coordinating linen ladders for easy adjustments. Grey looks good with anything, but the castle grey satin will look especially striking when used as part of a light and airy, white monochrome colour scheme, perfect for a home office or study.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Blizzard Grey Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Build a stunning window arrangement that's both stylish and practical with the ecowood deluxe in blizzard grey fine grain. This sleek collection of quality louvres creates a contemporary venetian blind made from convincing faux wood that's both moisture-resistant and has the ability to be adapted to any surrounding. Craft a chic ambience in your bedroom by hanging the blizzard grey fine grain amidst pastel pink walls and bedlinen.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Penthouse Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: Make your home feel like the penthouse with the ecowood deluxe in penthouse satin, a faux wood venetian blind offering sleek, wide slats, backed with designer ladder tapes, as well as bags of style. The penthouse satin will team up well with rich teal tones, making the perfect pairing for a bright and cheery bathroom colour scheme. Go for classic white tiles and suite, painting a feature wall in teal and accenting with matching accessories.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The designer look of the ecowood deluxe range simply cannot be beaten, and the pale cream chenille fine grain adds a new level of sophistication to the collection. Its classic look belies its hardwearing formula, as it is made from high quality, wood-look pvc for durability and water-resistance. Complement a classic brown and cream colour scheme by surrounding the chenille fine grain with chocolate browns, delicate taupes, and light oatmeals.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Chic Grey Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: The plush sheen of the ecowood deluxe's chic grey satin is modest and understated, with a polished feel and a smooth finish. Matching designer ladder ribbons, as well as pelmet and bottom rail, make the look whole. Craft a chic and contemporary haven in your master bedroom by blending the chic grey satin with pale, lemon yellow walls and matching grey trim. Include pretty florals featuring coordinating shades of yellow and grey, and don't forget to add plenty of luxe fabrics for extra cosiness.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Pistachio Shell Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to neutrals, there's no beating the soft grey-toned beige of the pistachio shell satin. Hailing from the ecowood deluxe range, this blind comes complete with linen backing ribbon and matching coordinates for a sleek and streamline look. Tone down a rich red feature wall in your living room or dining room by adding the pistachio shell satin to the scheme. Accent with accessories and ornaments in matching cream tones and the occasional splash of red here and there.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Absolute White Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: As luxurious as its collection suggests, the ecowood deluxe in absolute white satin has a smooth, satiny finish, accompanied by a purest white colouring. Coordinating fixtures, including designer-look linen ladder ribbons, enhance this chic look for a clean and unobstructed aesthetic. For a sleek monochrome look, couple the absolute white satin with dove grey walls and slick, black furniture. Use whites and silvers as accenting colours to finish off the look - one that would be ideal for a home office or studio space.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Devon Cream Satin - Venetian Blind
products.description: For an enchanting window arrangement, choose the ecowood deluxe in devon cream satin for its hardwearing faux wood and quality craftsmanship. This popular choice, with matching supports and decorative, designer detailing, generates a contemporary, venetian-style blind with quick and easy installation and valuable moisture-resistance. Generate a sophisticated restroom with peaceful shading by hanging the devon cream satin against a contemporary, dove grey surrounding.

products.title: Premier Taped Grained Bright White Faux Wood
products.description: Their best-selling premier faux wood range are made from high-quality flame-retardant pvc slats, and this bright, embossed white faux wood easily brightens the room. With tapes providing a polished and sleek finish, this blind is a perfect addition to rooms that need optimum light and privacy control. products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With its ash-like looks and grainy texture, the ecowood deluxe in driftwood fine grain has the authentic look and feel of real wood. The faux wood it's made of is high quality, moisture-resistant, and forms sleek, attractive slats, venetian style. Because wood goes with anything, the driftwood fine grain is one of the most versatile blinds around when it comes to looks. Use it with similarly toned woods in a light and airy kitchen, throwing in your favourite colour as an accent.

products.title: Ecowood Deluxe, Country Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: Gently textured to imitate genuine wood, the ecowood deluxe in country fine grain gives a quality impression of the real thing. All this despite being made from faux wood pvc, which makes it hardwearing and water-resistant. Do as it says on the tin and use the country fine grain as part of a rural, country theme in the kitchen. Opt for rustic shades of terracotta, sage green, and sky blue for the tiling, and choose units in a similar light wood.
